word:
MR No. 535 - Secretarial Work in the SDA Church

     In connection with my work Dores, has reported my sermons, and has helped on my book work. Clarence Crisler has also engaged in this line of work. This work will continue to be done by Brother Crisler and also by Dores Robinson.--Letter 340, 1908, pp. 2, 3. (To S. N. Haskell, December 9, 1908.)
